name: Into the City
description:
An endless runner with skyscrapers and flying cars: constantly increasing speed and tons of challenges for limitless fun!

Classic mode
Run! Try to not touch anything as long as you can and beat your distance record.

Inverted controls
Your ship has been hacked and all the commands have been inverted!

Car crusher
Time to be a little more... destructive. How many cars can you blow up before ending up the same way? 

FEATURES
• Fast gameplay with tons of sound effects
• Easy controls: tilt your device to move
• Beat your best scores
• Enjoy different game modes and rules
• Challenge yourself with new Achievements
• Play while offline
